info.title: Contract Accounting Document â€“ Manage
info.description:
Retrieve a list of documents. Read data on document header, document business partner line items and document general ledger line items.

Update document header and document business partner line items. Create and delete business locks on existing business partner line items.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve and update documents in Contract Accounting (FI-CA) from your SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Contract Accounting Open Item Management Integration(SAP_COM_0361)
[Contract Accounting - Open Item Management(2UJ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2UJ " Link To BP ")
[Contract Accounting: Open Item Management(PUJ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/PUJ " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http

GET BPItem HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptiontop)

skip.name: $skip
